<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>Update parent and child descriptor fields to translated fields for task relations  type</description>
        <name>Translate Relation fields</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateTaskRelFields();

function updateTaskRelFields() {
    var dictionary = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    dictionary.addQuery('name', 'IN', 'task_rel_type,task_rel_kb_type');
    dictionary.addQuery('element', 'IN', "parent_descriptor,child_descriptor,name");
    dictionary.query();
    while (dictionary.next()) {
        if (dictionary.element == 'parent_descriptor' || dictionary.element == 'child_descriptor')
            dictionary.internal_type = 'translated_field';

        if (dictionary.element == 'name')
            dictionary.calculation = "current.parent_descriptor.getDisplayValue() + '::' + current.child_descriptor.getDisplayValue()";
        dictionary.update();
    }
}]]></script>
